column4: where are the error logs located for when the computer boots up. I need to check what is going wrong when I boot the computer
Wow how come no one is answering me where the error logs are located for ubuntu
what logs are you looking for? Try /var/log? /var/log/syslog and /var/log/messages are a good start
syslog or messages is what you are looking for. Also try the command dmesg
